explains: vt. 攻击；质问；着手解决

sentences.en: My heart is in anguish within me; the terrors of death assail me.
sentences.cn: 我心在我里面甚是疼痛。 死的惊惶临到我身。

sentences.en: 9from the wicked who assail me, from my mortal enemies who surround me.
sentences.cn: 使我脱离那欺压我的恶人，就是围困我，要害我命的仇敌。

sentences.en: Their meeting was in Jobs's conference room, where Gates found himself surrounded by ten Apple employees who were eager to watch their boss assail him.
sentences.cn: 这次会面发生于乔布斯的会议上，盖茨一到那儿，就发现那里围了十个苹果员工，全都迫切希望看到自己的老板是怎样教训盖茨的。
